name: Mahjong Legend - Free Puzzle Quest
description:
This high-quality Mahjong game is one of the most popular board games in the world.
To match & remove open pairs of identical tiles before run out of time. Clear up all of mahjong in the board. It’s FREE and EASY to play! Can you solve every Mahjong puzzle?

NOTES:
Some in-game items are able to be purchased like props and Ads free.

Features:

• Enjoy 700+ captivating quests and puzzles
• Easy to start, tap & tap to match 2 same tiles to make them blast
• Collect rare cats and dogs
• Hints and shuffle items are offered to help
• Leaderboards are available
• Beautiful and various layouts
• Collect stars to unlock new levels
• Have fun playing with your friends and family

Download the best free Mahjong matching game in Android market now!
